channel.title: Linear regression on Dr. Mowinckel's
channel.description: Recent content in Linear regression on Dr. Mowinckel's

item.title: The Linear Regression Family in R
item.description: In this post we will go through examples of how we can specify different linear models (linear regressions) in R . The Linear Regression Family in RI will focus on how you can run models in R, and it will be up to you to try to translate your hypothesis into a model .
